1.name: MOP attribute -  Calendar
1.description: Regardless of the date, message can be sent via SWIFT

2.name: MOP attribute -Advance automatically to day after holiday
2.description: Regardless of the date, message can be sent via SWIFT

3.name: MOP attribute -  Cutoff
3.description: Regardless of the date, message can be sent via SWIFT

4.name: MT selection
4.description: GPP will send MT103/ MT202 via SWIFT

5.name: MT selection
5.description: GPP will send MT103 via SWIFT

6.name: MT selection
6.description: GPP will send MT103PLS via SWIFT

7.name: MT selection
7.description: GPP will send MT103PLS via SWIFT

8.name: MOP attribute - MOP currency
8.description: Regardless of the currency, message can be sent via SWIFT

9.name: MOP attribute - MOP selected by user
9.description: SWIFT can be selected as credit MOP

10.name: MOP attribute - MOP Force from schedule Q
10.description: User can force the payment out of schedule Q

11.name: MOP attribute - MOP  FIN copy
11.description: No FIN Copy service will be sent in the outgoing message

12.name: MOP attribute -SWIFT Identifier
12.description: In the outgoing SWIFT message that will be sent through SWIFT, block 1 will be populated with the office identifier (BIC).

14.name: MOP attribute - ACK/Confirmation
14.description: Message is sent to Wait ACK queue

15.name: ACK/Confirmation
15.description: Message is sent to NAK Q

16.name: ACK/Confirmation
16.description: Message is sent to Complete Q.

17.name: RMA Check required
17.description: SWIFT will be assessed and might be selected as MOP (depending on additional criteria in MOP selection process)
